title: Ticket #210: Add checks of dagman.out file(s) to all DAGMan tests
description:
I just added a check of the dagman.out files to the subdag test (to catch the bug Pete and I ran into a few days ago). It would probably be good to add a similar check to all of the DAGMan tests (the existing one looks for the "EXITING WITH STATUS 0" string).

It would probably also be good to make sure that there is only one "EXITING WITH STATUS ..." message per file.

We could also check that the "apparently invalid log file" messages don't show up -- changes in the user log code to handle log rotation made those appear, which could cause problems, since the dagman.out files are often plenty big already.
